# Performance Monitoring

## Metrics

### 1. Build Performance

- Build time
- Bundle size
- Test coverage

### 2. Code Quality

- Linting results
- Type checking
- Test results

### 3. Dependencies

- Update frequency
- Breaking changes
- Security patches

## Configuration Files

- `.github/workflows/quality-gate.yml`
- `.github/workflows/size-limit.yml`
- `.github/workflows/coverage.yml`
